scripts.deploy:build: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf ./out && DEPLOY=true ./node_modules/.bin/next build && DEPLOY=true ./node_modules/.bin/next export && cp ./serve.json ./out/
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:build; npm run deploy:serve & open http://localhost:3333
scripts.deploy:deleteremote:
npm run deploy:build && git checkout main && echo 'deleting if gh-pages exists locally.. This might fail and thats ok.' && git branch -D gh-pages; echo '

Let us deploy.' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ -f && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages && git checkout main && git branch -D gh-pages
